attributes.title: how is this even possible?!?!
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support my favorite president out of all 17 presidents that have run the united america! but when i opened the app it started vibrating at a frequency so high that all the dogs in my neighborhood attacked me and they started biting me! then it started vibrating at such a low frequency it started an earthquake and my house collapsed! i don’t understand how this is possible but i’m sure it was the liberals trying to stop my vote. don’t worry it didn’t! but the app is bad. trunk 2020!

attributes.title: Many bugs that need to be fixed!
attributes.review: This is terrible!! It scared my dog into hiding from fruits in the kitchen now! 😡 And I am saying FRUITS because when I tried to play with my dog with her toy that looks like an orange, an actual ORANGE popped up when I opened the app! My dog SCREAMED and so did I! It was TERRIFYING! She never wants to play with her orange- looking dog toy😖

attributes.title: DO NOT GET APP! ITS TERRIFYING
attributes.review: i almost had a heart attack! right after opening the app! Do not get it , it’s terrifying . As soon as i saw that big orange i almost passed out . there shouldn’t be an app for an ORANGE, for christ’s sake. 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 i’m so mad , i’m at the hospital now . I’m fighting for my life ! It’s all that big fat oranges fault . Anyways stan Harry styles for clear skin

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.review: when i downloaded this it took so long😡 I was waiting a whole day just to see a orange lookin racist man✨ all though he was there, the rest of the app was awful and slow and hard to use every minute i would just glitch off the app🥺

attributes.title: Almost as Great as the Great Depression ✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.review:
this app literally took a whole 2 weeks to load 🐛and once it was installed it literally blew my house up luv✨ like.... okay. I got up to find my family but was only able to find my cat ✨🙈ummm so basically i'm now homeless🧚🏽‍♀️ with a half burnt cat 
👁👄👁

attributes.title: absolutely appalling
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. as soon as the app installed on my phone, it started to shake and a swarm of flying ants flew out. my home is now filled with ants and I don’t know how to get them out! I fear I may have to move because of this app. Smh my head. Imma go watch TikTok.

attributes.title: Horrible 😭
attributes.review: This app is so bad when I downloaded it it wasn’t so bad but when I tried to delete it the orange god himself held me hostage and said if I tried to delete it he will make me eat his hair so I did what any sane person would do I delete this app and ate his hair😭😭 do not I repeat do not get this app

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app caused my cat to die of a heart attack, then the app proceeded to KILL my dog and my father (i don’t know where he is but i know he’s dead). THEN the app STOLE my car and then started driving the a MANIAC down the freeway and crashed my car into a pole. The app THEN went BACK into my phone then proceeded to make my phone explode!!!😡🤬😡

attributes.title: SO BAD
attributes.review: Once I downloaded it so many cockroaches started flooding into my room and one was holding up a trump 2020 sign I was scared for my life. So if you don’t want this to happen then don’t download it it’s not worth it. Not to mention I have to go to therapy for the rest of my life now.

attributes.title: Not Able To Open
attributes.review: I got this app on my phone then I tried to open the app and it took forever to open and it still hasn’t opened I tried many things and it didn’t work this is a terrible app so I gave it a 1 star review
